code: import React from'react';import{useState}from'react';import{ChevronDown,ChevronUp}from'lucide-react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const faqs=[{question:"How does the project tracking work?",answer:"Our project tracking system uses intuitive Kanban boards and Gantt charts to help you visualize project progress. Our API also allows you to build custom integrations for your specific needs."},{question:"How many projects can I manage?",answer:"The number of projects depends on your plan.
